venue.name: Boxford State Forest in North Andover

item.description: Boxford State Forest in North Andover is a great place to hunt for mushrooms. Alot of open space and well beaten easy to manuver trails. Easy to find. From 114, travel west on 114 until you see a sign that says "Welcome to North Andover" the first right after the sign is Sharpeners Pond Road. Follow Sharpeners Pond Rd, to the very end and you will be in the parking lot of Boxford State Forest. Park  in the lot, or along Sharpeners Pond Rd. Please contact me with any questions. Hope to see you there!
item.name: Mushroom Hunt at Boxford State Forest in North Andover
